targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  from_unixtime($__from/1000, '%Y %M %D') AS "Start",
  from_unixtime($__to/1000, '%Y %M %D') AS "End"
FROM aadiscordbot_authbotconfiguration

SELECT 
T7.`character_name` as metric,
sum(`invoices_invoice`.`amount`) as "Total Contributions"
FROM `invoices_invoice`
INNER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` ON (`invoices_invoice`.`character_id` = `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (`eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (`authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (`auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (`authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`) 
WHERE $__timeFilter(`invoices_invoice`.`due_date`) and T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)
GROUP BY T7.`character_name`
order by 2 desc

SELECT
   member_count
FROM eveonline_evecorporationinfo
WHERE corporation_id = $corp

SELECT 
sum(`invoices_invoice`.`amount`) as "Total Contributions"
FROM `invoices_invoice`
INNER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` ON (`invoices_invoice`.`character_id` = `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (`eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (`authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (`auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (`authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`) 
WHERE $__timeFilter(`invoices_invoice`.`due_date`) and T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  Avg(i.isk) as "Average",
  Min(i.isk) as "Min",
  Max(i.isk) as "Max"
From
(SELECT 
  Sum(`corptools_characteraudit`.`balance`) as isk
FROM 
  `eveonline_evecharacter` 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `corptools_characteraudit` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `corptools_characteraudit`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (
    `authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (
    `auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (
    `authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`
  ) 
Where 
  T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)
Group By 
  T7.`character_id`) i

SELECT 
sum(`invoices_invoice`.`amount`)/$members FROM `invoices_invoice`
INNER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` ON (`invoices_invoice`.`character_id` = `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (`eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (`authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (`auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (`authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`) 
WHERE $__timeFilter(`invoices_invoice`.`due_date`) and T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  i.name as "Main",
  i.isk as "Total Isk"
From
(SELECT 
  T7.`character_name` as name,
  Sum(`corptools_characteraudit`.`balance`) as isk
FROM 
  `eveonline_evecharacter` 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `corptools_characteraudit` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `corptools_characteraudit`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (
    `authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (
    `auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (
    `authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`
  ) 
Where 
  T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)
Group By 
  T7.`character_id`) i
where i.isk < $isk_min

SELECT 
  count(distinct T7.`character_name`)
FROM 
  `eveonline_evecharacter` 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (
    `authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (
    `auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (
    `authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`
  ) 
Where 
  T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

SELECT 
sum(`invoices_invoice`.`amount`)/$mains
FROM `invoices_invoice`
INNER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` ON (`invoices_invoice`.`character_id` = `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (`eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (`authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (`auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`) 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (`authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`) 
WHERE $__timeFilter(`invoices_invoice`.`due_date`) and T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  name
From
(SELECT 
  T7.character_name as name,
  Sum(`corptools_characteraudit`.`balance`) as isk
FROM 
  `eveonline_evecharacter` 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `corptools_characteraudit` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `corptools_characteraudit`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (
    `authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (
    `auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (
    `authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`
  ) 
Where 
  T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)
Group By 
  T7.`character_id`
) as i
where isnull(i.isk)

select 
  concat(count(distinct mc.character_id)," / ",$mains)
from 
  (select location_id,character_id,type_name_id,location_name_id 
  	from corptools_characterasset 
	  	where type_name_id in (
	          '45647','42243','19724','19722','19726','19720','42124','52907'
	  	  ) 
	  	and location_name_id in (
		    select 
		      distinct(loc.location_id) 
		    from 
		      corptools_evelocation loc 
		      left outer join corptools_mapsystem sys on loc.system_id = sys.system_id 
		    where 
		      sys.system_id in ($StagingSystem)
		  ) 
  ) assets 
  join corptools_characteraudit ac on assets.character_id = ac.id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter ec on ac.character_id = ec.id 
  join corptools_eveitemtype it on assets.type_name_id = it.type_id 
  left outer join corptools_evelocation el on assets.location_name_id = el.location_id 
  join authentication_characterownership co on ec.id = co.character_id
  join authentication_userprofile up ON up.user_id = co.user_id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter mc ON up.main_character_id = mc.id 
where 
 mc.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  concat(count(distinct mc.character_id)," / ",$mains)
from 
  (select location_id,character_id,type_name_id,location_name_id 
  	from corptools_characterasset 
	  	where type_name_id in (
          '11567','671','45649','3764','42241','23773','42126'
	  	  ) 
	  	and location_name_id in (
		    select 
		      distinct(loc.location_id) 
		    from 
		      corptools_evelocation loc 
		      left outer join corptools_mapsystem sys on loc.system_id = sys.system_id 
		    where 
		      sys.system_id in ($StagingSystem)
		  ) 
  ) assets 
  join corptools_characteraudit ac on assets.character_id = ac.id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter ec on ac.character_id = ec.id 
  join corptools_eveitemtype it on assets.type_name_id = it.type_id 
  left outer join corptools_evelocation el on assets.location_name_id = el.location_id 
  join authentication_characterownership co on ec.id = co.character_id
  join authentication_userprofile up ON up.user_id = co.user_id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter mc ON up.main_character_id = mc.id 
where 
 mc.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

SELECT
  last_kill AS "time",
  id
FROM aastatistics_statscharacter
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(last_kill)
ORDER BY last_kill

select 
  concat(count(distinct mc.character_id)," / ",$mains)
from 
  (select location_id,character_id,type_name_id,location_name_id 
  	from corptools_characterasset 
	  	where type_name_id in (
    '23757','23915','24483','23911'
	  	  ) 
	  	and location_name_id in (
		    select 
		      distinct(loc.location_id) 
		    from 
		      corptools_evelocation loc 
		      left outer join corptools_mapsystem sys on loc.system_id = sys.system_id 
		    where 
		      sys.system_id in ($StagingSystem)
		  ) 
  ) assets 
  join corptools_characteraudit ac on assets.character_id = ac.id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter ec on ac.character_id = ec.id 
  join corptools_eveitemtype it on assets.type_name_id = it.type_id 
  left outer join corptools_evelocation el on assets.location_name_id = el.location_id 
  join authentication_characterownership co on ec.id = co.character_id
  join authentication_userprofile up ON up.user_id = co.user_id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter mc ON up.main_character_id = mc.id 
where 
 mc.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  concat(count(distinct mc.character_id)," / ",$mains)
from 
  (select location_id,character_id,type_name_id,location_name_id 
  	from corptools_characterasset 
	  	where type_name_id in (
          '23919','22852','23913','3514','42125','23917'
	  	  ) 
	  	and location_name_id in (
		    select 
		      distinct(loc.location_id) 
		    from 
		      corptools_evelocation loc 
		      left outer join corptools_mapsystem sys on loc.system_id = sys.system_id 
		    where 
		      sys.system_id in ($StagingSystem)
		  ) 
  ) assets 
  join corptools_characteraudit ac on assets.character_id = ac.id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter ec on ac.character_id = ec.id 
  join corptools_eveitemtype it on assets.type_name_id = it.type_id 
  left outer join corptools_evelocation el on assets.location_name_id = el.location_id 
  join authentication_characterownership co on ec.id = co.character_id
  join authentication_userprofile up ON up.user_id = co.user_id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter mc ON up.main_character_id = mc.id 
where 
 mc.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  concat(count(distinct mc.character_id)," / ",$mains)
from 
  (select location_id,character_id,type_name_id,location_name_id 
  	from corptools_characterasset 
	  	where type_name_id in (
          '37604','42242','37606','45645','37605','37607'
	  	  ) 
	  	and location_name_id in (
		    select 
		      distinct(loc.location_id) 
		    from 
		      corptools_evelocation loc 
		      left outer join corptools_mapsystem sys on loc.system_id = sys.system_id 
		    where 
		      sys.system_id in ($StagingSystem)
		  ) 
  ) assets 
  join corptools_characteraudit ac on assets.character_id = ac.id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter ec on ac.character_id = ec.id 
  join corptools_eveitemtype it on assets.type_name_id = it.type_id 
  left outer join corptools_evelocation el on assets.location_name_id = el.location_id 
  join authentication_characterownership co on ec.id = co.character_id
  join authentication_userprofile up ON up.user_id = co.user_id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter mc ON up.main_character_id = mc.id 
where 
 mc.`corporation_id` in ($corp)

select 
  concat(count(i.isk), " / ", $mains)
From
(SELECT 
  Sum(`corptools_characteraudit`.`balance`) as isk
FROM 
  `eveonline_evecharacter` 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `corptools_characteraudit` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `corptools_characteraudit`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (
    `authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (
    `auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (
    `authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`
  ) 
Where 
  T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)
Group By 
  T7.`character_id`) i
  
where i.isk < $isk_min

select 
  mc.character_name as "Main", 
  GROUP_CONCAT(it.name SEPARATOR ", ") as "Item"
from 
  (select location_id,character_id,type_name_id,location_name_id 
  	from corptools_characterasset 
	  	where type_name_id in (
    '23919', '37604', '23757', '11567', 
    '45647', '42243', '23915', '42242', 
    '671', '22852', '45649', '3764', '37606', 
    '45645', '37605', '42241', '19724', 
    '19722', '24483', '37607', '23913', 
    '19726', '23773', '19720', '3514', 
    '28352', '33687', '23911', '42126', 
    '42124', '42125', '23917', '52907'
	  	  ) 
	  	and location_name_id in (
		    select 
		      distinct(loc.location_id) 
		    from 
		      corptools_evelocation loc 
		      left outer join corptools_mapsystem sys on loc.system_id = sys.system_id 
		    where 
		      sys.system_id in ($StagingSystem)
		  ) 
  ) assets 
  join corptools_characteraudit ac on assets.character_id = ac.id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter ec on ac.character_id = ec.id 
  join corptools_eveitemtype it on assets.type_name_id = it.type_id 
  join corptools_eveitemgroup ig on it.group_id = ig.group_id 
  left outer join corptools_evelocation el on assets.location_name_id = el.location_id 
  join authentication_characterownership co on ec.id = co.character_id
  join authentication_userprofile up ON up.user_id = co.user_id 
  join eveonline_evecharacter mc ON up.main_character_id = mc.id 
where 
 mc.`corporation_id` in ($corp) 
group by 
  1

panels.title: Mains with Capitals and less than Cutoff Isk

list.definition:
SELECT
  corporation_id as __value, corporation_name as __text
FROM eveonline_evecorporationinfo
WHERE alliance_id = 1
order by corporation_name
list.label: Corporation
list.name: corp
list.query:
SELECT
  corporation_id as __value, corporation_name as __text
FROM eveonline_evecorporationinfo
WHERE alliance_id = 1
order by corporation_name

list.definition: select system_id as __value, name as __text from corptools_mapsystem
list.name: StagingSystem
list.query: select system_id as __value, name as __text from corptools_mapsystem

list.definition:
SELECT
   member_count
FROM eveonline_evecorporationinfo
WHERE corporation_id = $corp
list.name: members
list.query:
SELECT
   member_count
FROM eveonline_evecorporationinfo
WHERE corporation_id = $corp

list.definition:
SELECT 
  count(distinct T7.`character_name`)
FROM 
  `eveonline_evecharacter` 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_characterownership` ON (
    `eveonline_evecharacter`.`id` = `authentication_characterownership`.`character_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `auth_user` ON (
    `authentication_characterownership`.`user_id` = `auth_user`.`id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `authentication_userprofile` ON (
    `auth_user`.`id` = `authentication_userprofile`.`user_id`
  ) 
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `eveonline_evecharacter` T7 ON (
    `authentication_userprofile`.`main_character_id` = T7.`id`
  ) 
Where 
  T7.`corporation_id` in ($corp)
